data.title: Publication – The Basic Law and Hong Kong (EN)
data.text:
Publication: "The Basic Law and Hong Kong - The 15th Anniversary of Reunification with the Motherland"

This book gives an account of the development of the Hong Kong SAR in the 15 years following its reunification with the Mainland.
